name: Rennan Cockles
title: Software Engineer | Machine Learning Engineer | Python Specialist
summary:
Computer Engineer with emphasis on computational modeling by the State University of Rio de Janeiro with 10+ years of experience in technology areas such as software engineering, artificial intelligence and infrastructure. 
ML engineer with a strong background in software development and focus on problem solving and a strong background in development, able to architect and build well-structured, testable and maintainable applications, following the best practices in architecture and design.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.org: State University of Rio de Janeiro, UERJ

education.title: Post-Graduation in Analytics and Business Intelligence
education.org: Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais, PUCMG

workExperience.description:
Blue Orange Digital is recognized as a “Top AI Development and Consultant Agency” by Clutch and YahooFinance, for innovations in predictive analytics, automation, and optimization with machine learning in NYC. We help organizations optimize and automate their businesses, implement data-driven analytic techniques and understand the implications of new technologies such as artificial intelligence, big data, and the Internet of Things. 
In my role as Data Engineering / Machine Learning Engineer, I work together with the biggest credit report and score company in the world with clients in more than 100 countries. My main job is to development and implement the platform that suports machine learning models used by our clients
workExperience.tools: Python, Docker, Git, Github, Bitbucket, Machinify, Jenkins, JFrog, Snowflake, AWS Cloud, Azure

workExperience.description: Specialist data engineer responsible for the architecture and maintenance of the company's Data Lake as well as the structuring of data ingestion and ETL flows, configuration and integration of AWS with Databricks using SSO to support the development of predictive models by the team of data scientists, developing a well-documented API and code testing to give access to machine learning models in production while always following Agile principles with continuous integration and delivery pipelines
workExperience.tools: Python, FastAPI, VueJS, Spark, Git, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Bitbucket, Bitbucket Pipelines, Databricks, AWS Cloud (S3, Glue, Lambda, RDS, ...)

workExperience.description: Senior data scientist working in the pricing team interacting with the business team to define projects and deliveries. Responsible for developing tools that help the business team to carry out and maintain more strategic pricing for the company
workExperience.tools: Linux, Python, VueJS, Spark, Pandas, Alteryx, Jenkins, Databricks, Azure Cloud, Data Factory, Data Lake, Nginx and Git

workExperience.description: Lead Engineer of Machine Learning projects. Responsible for all stack from configuring Linux server to publishing the machine learning application as a Python API with Flask Framework
workExperience.tools: Linux, Python, Keras, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Flask, Jenkins, Sentry, Nginx and Git

workExperience.description: Software engineer of the Innovations team interacting with the business team to define new demands and deliveries using the principles of SCRUM and Kanban methodologies. Responsible for introducing automated tasks such as deploying applications in different environments (DEV, HLG, PROD), using migrations for databases, adoption of CI/CD tools and error tracking with Sentry
workExperience.tools: C#, .NET (Framework e Core), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, VueJS, Git, Agile Development (SCRUM, Kanban), Jenkins, Sentry, SQL Server and IIS Web Server

workExperience.description:
Configuration of Cisco, Huawei, Datacom and MikroTik equipment, network expansion projects, user support, management and monitoring of the network, development of tools like: 
• Scripts in Bash to use (or not) with Nagios for monitoring the power (dBm) and traffic (Mbps) of SFPs 
• Web application for mapping and monitoring the company's backbone in real time warning link faults through a bot in telegram 
• Cacti graph templates for Huawei devices 
• Web application with maps to help network expansion projects 
• Telegram bot to inform devices status
workExperience.tools: Linux, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Nagios, Cacti

workExperience.description:

• Sales Funnel

• Business intelligence tool
